h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: After you defeat the lone archer guarding the ramp up out of the prison, you may notice any current curse applied to you will dissipate the moment you reach the top! You can celebrate this breath of fresh air, just be wary of a Frozen Corpse waiting to try and attack you as you cross the last wooden beam.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Upper Pagoda (Level 4)'.
The content is as follows:
After you defeat the lone archer guarding the ramp up out of the prison, you may notice any current curse applied to you will dissipate the moment you reach the top! You can celebrate this breath of fresh air, just be wary of a Frozen Corpse waiting to try and attack you as you cross the last wooden beam.
